title: App: The Human Story - My Story
excerpt: There is a Kickstarter project that was started recently for a film titled App: The Human Story. It “is the story of the cultural phenomenon that touches all our lives.” It is about the people who make apps. Many of them are people I follow on blogs, and listen to on podcasts, and look up to. author: Rod Schmidt

title: Panic - Extras - The True Story of Audion
excerpt: Is it just me? I mean, do you ever wonder about the stories behind everyday products?  What names were Procter & Gamble considering before they finally picked "Swiffer"? (Springle? author: Cabel Sasser

title: Origins of the AppStore: The Electronic AppWrapper
excerpt: At the opening of the 1990s, veteran developer and startup junkie, Jesse Tayler, invented the Electronic AppWrapper, the predecessor to the original iTumes music store and today’s iPhone AppStore. That first AppStore was created with the same tools developers use to make iPhone apps today. TENDIGI...
